verses.name: Psalms 83:1
verses.text: Keep not thou silence, O God: hold not thy peace, and be not still, O God.

verses.name: Psalms 83:2
verses.text: For, lo, thine enemies make a tumult: and they that hate thee have lifted up the head.

verses.name: Psalms 83:3
verses.text: They have taken crafty counsel against thy people, and consulted against thy hidden ones.

verses.name: Psalms 83:4
verses.text: They have said, Come, and let us cut them off from being a nation; that the name of Israel may be no more in remembrance.

verses.name: Psalms 83:5
verses.text: For they have consulted together with one consent: they are confederate against thee:

verses.name: Psalms 83:6
verses.text: The tabernacles of Edom, and the Ishmaelites; of Moab, and the Hagarenes;

verses.name: Psalms 83:7
verses.text: Gebal, and Ammon, and Amalek; the Philistines with the inhabitants of Tyre;

verses.name: Psalms 83:8
verses.text: Assur also is joined with them: they have holpen the children of Lot. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 83:9
verses.text: Do unto them as unto the Midianites; as to Sisera, as to Jabin, at the brook of Kison:

verses.name: Psalms 83:10
verses.text: Which perished at Endor: they became as dung for the earth.

verses.name: Psalms 83:11
verses.text: Make their nobles like Oreb, and like Zeeb: yea, all their princes as Zebah, and as Zalmunna:

verses.name: Psalms 83:12
verses.text: Who said, Let us take to ourselves the houses of God in possession.

verses.name: Psalms 83:13
verses.text: O my God, make them like a wheel; as the stubble before the wind.

verses.name: Psalms 83:14
verses.text: As the fire burneth a wood, and as the flame setteth the mountains on fire;

verses.name: Psalms 83:15
verses.text: So persecute them with thy tempest, and make them afraid with thy storm.

verses.name: Psalms 83:16
verses.text: Fill their faces with shame; that they may seek thy name, O Lord.

verses.name: Psalms 83:17
verses.text: Let them be confounded and troubled for ever; yea, let them be put to shame, and perish:

verses.name: Psalms 83:18
verses.text: That men may know that thou, whose name alone is Jehovah, art the most high over all the earth.
